tweets.text: On duty today as the area Flood Operation duty officer, our teams are out across the area @EnvAgencyMids We have Barriers erected and being looked after 24/7 at #Hereford #Shrewsbury #Bewdley we are also checking and clearing  #trashscreens (All other barriers loaded and ready ) https://t.co/awkpt6VlwM

@BristolCouncil @EnvAgency Work with the potential impact of floodwater in planning future developments not try to fight against it. Be creative in our designs to deliver climate resilient homes and workspaces fit for a 21C world.

@BristolCouncil @EnvAgency I‚Äôm very keen that the City looks to use natural ways to manage floodwater rather than extensive concrete channels and culverts where  possible. Using elevated concrete walkways to provide resilience and safe egress during a flood event proposed by some are wrong in my view.

Did you know Bristol has a history of flooding, including 20 tidal floods in the last decade alone? 
We‚Äôve worked with @envagency to develop new proposals to manage Bristol‚Äôs flood risk in the future. 
Tell us what you think before 20 December (tomorrow!)
https://t.co/XXgKiXx88f

tweets.text: @BristolCouncil @EnvAgency Did you know Bristol Council has a history of allowing developments to be built in an area of flood risk in the last 25 years? The current incumbent @MarvinJRees wants to build even more, he failed to hit his home build figure in his manifesto .  Failed filed in F as in Fiction

Heavy rain in the south-west of England today will bring a high risk of surface water #flooding.

Stay safe and don‚Äôt walk or drive through flood water.
For guidance on #SurfaceWaterFlooding in your area, contact your local authority.

@JamieMc76633051 @GeorgeMonbiot @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @HelenStace_HWT In England in 19/20 average farm income was ¬£46K. Within this Agri-environment/BPS (i.e. your money and mine) made up about 2/3 and diversification (B&B, renting buildings etc) the rest. Actual income from agriculture (growing stuff) was slightly less than zero.

You learn something new every day they say!

Well I never knew that sewage fungus could grow on a concrete step just below this sewage outfall pipe.  Pretty obvious where the pollution is coming from don't you think @EnvAgency? ü§î

Not helping the discharge area is it?  ü§® https://t.co/BJUp2UPvSL
@timthefruit @GeorgeMonbiot @DaveThroupEA @EnvAgency @HelenStace_HWT Is it still the case that without subsidies most of our farms would be unviable businesses?
